divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling on 90W at around 5pm between the Hilliard and Clague Rd. exits. The sky was perfectly clear except for some clouds very low on the horizon. I saw out of the corner of my eye what I first assumed was a helicopter hovering in place. I looked up and noticed immediately that I was mistaken, as this craft had no wings, blades, or anything. It was simply a smooth, metallic silver pill-shaped object. I only got to look at it for a couple of seconds before (I assume) the car in front of me noticed it, too, and hit their brakes suddenly. I looked away for only a second to gain control of my car and looked back less than two seconds later to see that the object had disappeared without a trace.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in North Olmsted
There were no other sightings in North Olmsted on or around July 1st 2010
